greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Nodes in riff (rooted index-functional forest) for n.
comment: A061396(n) gives number of times n appears in this sequence.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
J. Awbrey, Illustrations of riffs for small integers
formula: a(Prod(p_i^e_i)) = Sum(a(i)+a(e_i)+1), product over nonzero e_i in prime factorization.
mathematica: a[1] = 0; a[n_] := a[n] = Sum[{p, e} = pe; a[PrimePi[p]] + a[e] + 1, {pe, FactorInteger[n]}]; Array[a, 105] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 26 2019 *)
results.author: _David W. Wilson_, Jun 25 2001
